content:encoded:
This week Case Closed, we begin with The Big Book, from The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe. That episode originally aired September 29, 1950.

(30:00) Our second episode is The Case Of The Avenging Blade, from Sherlock Holmes. That story aired February 1, 1948.

Download CaseClosed717

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you would like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more info. Thank you.
